name: Time Travel Pinball
description:
This is a pinball game where you are a member of the time police. Your goal is to maintain the continuity of your original timeline by capturing time travelling criminals before they can commit their crimes.

This is a very short (and somewhat incomplete) game, but I may consider working on it a bit more in the future, so if you have any suggestions feel free to say them.

Controls:

Z   = Left Flipper

X   = Tilt

/   = Right Flipper

Esc = Close Game

F2  = Reset Game

F3  = Pause Game

F4  = Toggle Fullscreen

Credits:
